items.sentence: I offered to help Tom, but he didn't want my help.
Will all you girls be going on the picnic with us?
Tom was just three years old when his mother died.
It cost me thirty dollars to get my bicycle fixed.
Tom didn't ask me any questions I couldn't answer.
It's too late at night for you to walk home alone.
When we reached the summit, we all yelled "Yahoo!"
The play was performed by a group of young actors.
The house is dilapidated, and the roof is leaking.
Is Tom eating the sandwich that Mary made for him?
